content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI received an error message when trying to display the output.png file using the "execute_shell" command with the argument "display output.png". My computer returned an error message stating it was unable to open X server. I then sent a command to display the output.png file using the "execute_shell" command with the argument "cat output.png | imgcat". However, my computer returned an error message stating that "imgcat" was not found and that "output.png" could not be found.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eddieantonio/imgcat/master/imgcat > imgcat && chmod +x imgcat"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb''"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "cat output.png | ./imgcat"}}}'}]
"""
